text: Va guft padarason: «Ej pisaroni man, cun ʙa Misr rasided, az jak darvoza doxil nasaved, az darvozahoi gunogun doxil saved, to zaxmi casm narasad ʙar sumo. Va nametavonam cizero ki Alloh ʙar sumo muqarrar kardaast az sumo dur kunam va hec farmone cuz farmoni Alloh nest. Bar U tavakkal kardam va tavakkalkunandagon ʙar U tavakkal kunand»
